metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32294 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libgig through 20200507. A heap-buffer-overflowexists in the function RIFF::List::GetSubList located in RIFF.cpp. Itallows an attacker to cause code Execution.

criterions.comment: libgig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
